017
018package com.fluidops.fedx.cache;
019
020import info.aduna.iteration.CloseableIteration;
021
022import java.io.Serializable;
023import java.util.List;
024
025import org.openrdf.model.Statement;
026
027import com.fluidops.fedx.cache.Cache.StatementSourceAssurance;
028import com.fluidops.fedx.exception.EntryUpdateException;
029import com.fluidops.fedx.structures.Endpoint;
030
031/**
032 * Interface for a CacheEntry
033 * 
034 * @author Andreas Schwarte
035 *
036 */
037public interface CacheEntry extends Serializable {
038
039        /**
040         * Returns HAS_STATEMENTS, if this endpoint can provide results, NONE in the contrary case.
041         * 
042         * Initially it is pessimistically assumed that each endpoint can provide result. Hence,
043         * if some endpoint is not known to the cache, the cache return POSSIBLY_HAS_STATEMENTS
044         * 
045         * @param endpoint
046         * @return
047         */
048        public StatementSourceAssurance canProvideStatements(Endpoint endpoint);
049        
050        
051        /**
052         * Returns a list of endpoints for which this cache result has any locally available data.
053         * 
054         * @return
055         *              a list of endpoints or the empty list
056         */
057        public List<Endpoint> hasLocalStatements();
058        
059        /**
060         * Returns true iff this cache result has any local available data for the specified endpoint.
061         * 
062         * @param endpoint
063         * @return
064         */
065        public boolean hasLocalStatements(Endpoint endpoint);
066        
067        
068        /**
069         * Return all results available for this cache entry.
070         *  
071         * @return
072         */
073        public CloseableIteration<? extends Statement, Exception> getStatements();
074        
075        
076        /**
077         * Return all results available for the specified endpoint.
078         * 
079         * @param endpoint
080         * @return
081         */
082        public CloseableIteration<? extends Statement, Exception> getStatements(Endpoint endpoint);
083        
084        
085        /**
086         * Return the endpoints that are mirrored in the cache result
087         * 
088         * @return
089         */
090        public List<Endpoint> getEndpoints();
091        
092        
093        /**
094         * Ask if this CacheResult is up2date
095         * 
096         * @return
097         */
098        public boolean isUpToDate();
099        
100        
101        /**
102         * Update this cache result, e.g. retrieve contents from web source (Optional Operation)
103         * 
104         * @throws EntryUpdateException
105         */
106        public void update() throws EntryUpdateException;
107        
108        
109        
110        public void add(EndpointEntry endpointEntry);
111        
112        
113        /**
114         * Update this cache entry and merge data with the specified item.
115         * 
116         * @param other
117         * @throws EntryUpdateException
118         */
119        public void merge(CacheEntry other) throws EntryUpdateException;
120}
